name: WhatHappenedGames
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A brief rundown of the biggest stories from the world of video games, every day. Includes any important updates about the entire industry, including PC, consoles (whether Xbox, PlayStation, or Nintendo), or general information about the industry at large (like the ongoing Steam vs. Epic situation).

Coverage includes both AAA and Indie games but generally ignores mobile (unless something is relevant to core gamers like XCloud/Stadia/Luna streaming, Nintendo's mobile announcements, etc.).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
